title: IHOF
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : International House of Fonts (IHOF)**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513im_/http:/typophile.com/files/images_6385.jpeg)

**International House of Fonts** is a division of [P22 Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22) which showcases distinctive type designs and designers from around the world. Operating as a download-only type boutique, IHOF is proud to offer such fine faces as [P22 Dearest](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/dearest.html) (which is consistently on the [Best Sellers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/www.myfonts.com/bestsellers.html) list at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MyFonts)), [P22 Operina](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/operinaset.html) and many other fine faces. If you are considering releasing one of your own type designs or are looking to license some fresh type, check out IHOF.

website: [International House of Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003513/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/)
author: James Grieshaber
